StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [UpdateIST]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@NwaRowGuid uniqueiden..er, @ISTDate date.me, @Height decimal(4,2), @Weight int, @ISTRunTimeMinutes int, @ISTRunTimeSeconds int, @ISTPullups int, @ISTHang int = null, @ISTCrunches int, @LastEditBy varchar(50), @ISTPushups int = null, @ISTPlankTimeMinutes int = null, @ISTPlankTimeSeconds int = null, @ISTNote varchar(255) = null AS BEGIN
SET NOCOUNT ON
DECLARE @ContractID int
SELECT @ContractID = CONTRACT_ID FROM [MCRISS].[dbo].[CONTRACT] c INNER JOIN [MCRISS].[dbo].[NWA] n ON c.[NWA_ID] = n.[NWA_ID] WHERE n.RowGuid = @NwaRowGuid
-- the applicant needs to be contracted IF @ContractID IS NOT NULL BEGIN
DECLARE @Latest_Weight int -- Get Weight From Latest IST record SELECT TOP 1 @Latest_Weight = ist.[WEIGHT] FROM [Prospec.ng].[USMC].[ProspectPhysicalIst] ist INNER JOIN [Prospec.ng].[USMC].[Prospect] p on p.ProspectId = ist.ProspectID WHERE p.NwaId = @NwaRowGuid AND ist.[WEIGHT] IS NOT NULL ORDER BY ist.[TestDate] DESC, ist.[LastUpdateDate] DESC
IF @Latest_Weight is not null BEGIN SET @Weight = @Latest_Weight END
IF @Height = 0 BEGIN SET @Height = null END
IF @Weight = 0 BEGIN SET @Weight = null END
UPDATE [MCRISS].[dbo].[CONTRACT] SET [IST_DATE] = @ISTDate ,[IST_HEIGHT] = @Height ,[IST_WEIGHT] = @Weight ,[IST_MINUTES] = @ISTRunTimeMinutes ,[IST_SECONDS] = @ISTRunTimeSeconds ,[IST_PULL_UPS] = @ISTPullups ,[IST_PUSH_UPS] = @ISTPushups ,[IST_HANG] = @ISTHang ,[IST_CRUNCHES] = @ISTCrunches ,[USER_LOGIN] = @LastEditBy ,[IST_RESULT] = null ,[UPDATE_DATE] = GetDate() ,[IST_PLANK_MINUTES] = @ISTPlankTimeMinutes ,[IST_PLANK_SECONDS] = @ISTPlankTimeSeconds ,[IST_Note] = @ISTNote WHERE [CONTRACT_ID] = @ContractID END END
